name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zlinky: AI Bookmark and Screenshot Organization App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your productivity: save links, share screenshots, build a resource library, & access AI powered insights about a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once you set-up a Zlinky account (it's free), you can access the following features via the Zlinky Chrome Extension:

* Snip a screenshot & easily share the screenshot via a quick copy and paste into Slack, Teams, email, WhatsApp etc.
* Organize screenshots into your Zlinky folders.
* Effortlessly save links into your Zlinky folders.
* Use ZlinkyAI (powered by ChatGPT) to summarise, or find out more about the web page that you are viewing. 


Uses for Zlinky include:

* Save important articles to read later
* Save links to frequently used websites & applications
* Organize project research
* Save & centralise relevant video content from Social Media sites [eg. YouTube, TikTok, Instagram Reels] into your Zlinky folders 
* Save links to Podcasts for future listening
* Quickly share screenshots with colleagues 
* Use the ZlinkyAI chatbot to find out more about the web page you are viewing (powered by ChatGPT)
* Use the ZlinkyAI chatbot as a general AI chatbot without leaving your browser tab (powered by ChatGPT)
* An optional note can be attached to any saved link, image or screenshot to help with context.

The Chrome extension also allows for quick access to your Zlinky folder library, via the desktop Web version of your Zlinky account. 

You can access your Zlinky account via any mobile, laptop or desktop device.
